__e: No, it's my party, but Glenn's a friend of mine,
I've already checked Glenn's house, and there's no sign he's even been there.
The reason that I didn't like Glenn... she took my spot.
I'm sure the Glenns barely noticed.
Glenn, it's not fair to make everyone wait until the end of the day.
And it didn't take very long, because as it turns out, - Glenn doesn't take very long. - Compared to who?
